author: ebourg
msg: Added XMLPropertiesConfiguration to support the new XML format for java.util.Properties introduced in Java 1.5

author: ebourg
msg: Added a comment header to PropertiesConfiguration (bug 26092).
The header is not parsed when the file is loaded yet.

author: ebourg
msg: Added the setEncoding(String) and the getEncoding() methods to the FileConfiguration interface to control the encoding of the configuration file.

author: ebourg
msg: Changed PropertyWriter and unescapeJava to make them independant from the static delimiter. This will allow instance specific delimiters.
